Articles.Content: Awesome! Can't wait!
Keeping an eye on this! Looking good...
Wow, great, a Mercury capsule! I know Frizzank was planning on making one, but yours looks so awesome! The Atlas rocket looks great, too!
The Mercury stuff looks great. How modular is it going to be?
How's it going? I'd like to at least see the HTV released, to "complete" the H-II rocket. Also, it'd come in handy for ISS mod, which I'm starting to come back to.
update for techtree soon ?

Wow, great, a Mercury capsule! I know Frizzank was planning on making one, but yours looks so awesome! The Atlas rocket looks great, too!

thanks!

The Mercury stuff looks great. How modular is it going to be?

Mercury Atlas

1.Emergency rescue system

2.Parachute

3.Mercury Spacecraft

4.Engine brake

5.Decouple

6.Rocket Atlas-D

How's it going? I'd like to at least see the HTV released, to "complete" the H-II rocket. Also, it'd come in handy for ISS mod, which I'm starting to come back to.

HTV will be no earlier version 0.5. Rough plan the development of mod

update for techtree soon ?

Update will be for 5-7 days. Also, it will be adapted for science

Lunar module WIP

I trust 6 is actually 6 and 7, for Atlas core+sustainer, and boosters+boattail, right? Since the latter decouples about a minute and a half into flight...

Liking the LM!

I think that making a Gemini capsule might be redundant, as Frizzank has already made one in a great quality, and with a lot of extra stuff at that, including things that were on the drawing board but never got realized. Unless, of course, you want to make it a different size (as Frizzank's is scaled to 2.5m). You make great stuff nonetheless, and your LUnar Excursion Module looks awesome!

I trust 6 is actually 6 and 7, for Atlas core+sustainer, and boosters+boattail, right? Since the latter decouples about a minute and a half into flight...

Liking the LM!

I think that making a Gemini capsule might be redundant, as Frizzank has already made one in a great quality, and with a lot of extra stuff at that, including things that were on the drawing board but never got realized. Unless, of course, you want to make it a different size (as Frizzank's is scaled to 2.5m). You make great stuff nonetheless, and your LUnar Excursion Module looks awesome!

Gemini will be a rocket diameter titan, 2 meters

Aw, that's sad. That's what's so cool about the Atlas, that it's stage-and-a-half! Won't be a real Atlas otherwise.

Do you need reference pictures of it after staging? Or is it just too much work?

Aw, that's sad. That's what's so cool about the Atlas, that it's stage-and-a-half! Won't be a real Atlas otherwise.

Do you need reference pictures of it after staging? Or is it just too much work?

The information will not be superfluous. As I said in the future will likely do detachable engines for Atlas
Finaly we'll have an accurately textured LM as I see. Good work on both of the Atlas and the LEM.
This post in the FASA thread has lots of Atlas reference pics.

This post in the FASA thread has lots of Atlas reference pics.

Hey, did someone just reference a post of mine?

Excellent work so far, Lovad. And it's nice to see someone taking an honest crack at the LEM!

Deltac, I just saw your reference pics. Did you take the photo of the aft end of the Atlas? I've walked past that particular one more times than I can recall. Well, walked past it, climbed on it, poked around to get a better look at the engines...

Excellent work so far, Lovad. And it's nice to see someone taking an honest crack at the LEM!

Deltac, I just saw your reference pics. Did you take the photo of the aft end of the Atlas? I've walked past that particular one more times than I can recall. Well, walked past it, climbed on it, poked around to get a better look at the engines...

No, it was a pic found on the internet

@Lovad: I decided to give the Saturn V a try. It seems to handle better than what I was previously using for a Mun mission. My payload is well below the 90 ton limit, which leaves me room to expand on my design if I want to. The second stage tends to overheat quickly. Is the overheat on purpose?
Sorry, should have said "this post by Deltac, who found some awesome pics. Apologies. :}

Sorry, should have said "this post by Deltac, who found some awesome pics. Apologies. :}

Oh don't worry about that stuff, as far as I know, there's no copyright with posts
I'm still interested in getting that HTV. I know ISS is kinda on hold, but that'd be useful when the project re-starts.
Delayed the release of version 0.4. Since the that at the moment I do not have time to be engaged in them. On that last week my wife's father was hospitalized with a stroke. Today he died on Monday.
My condolences, Lovad. By all means, family matters come first.
My condolences. I hope you get your RL stuff together soon. A family crisis is a really though thing to go through.
Same. Best wishes and condolences in a very hard time!

Loving the way things are looking here! Gotta try out this Saturn V!

Also, condolences to you during this time, Lovad.
